panels.description: The time between the local Mempool receiving the transaction and time to be committed.

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, bucket) (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator", stage="consensus_ready"}[$interval])) / sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, bucket) (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator", stage="consensus_ready"}[$interval]))
